channel.title: frankrowe.org
channel.description: The personal blog of Frank Rowe, an independent web and GIS developer located on the Eastern Shore of Maryland.

item.title: npm-scripts > grunt
item.description: Why npm-scripts is better than grunt/gulp for running build scripts.

item.title: location-bar: GPS coordinates in your menu bar
item.description: Display your current GPS coordinates in your OS X menu bar.

item.title: Salisbury Police Daily Calls Map
item.description: A quick map made using open data from the Salisbury, MD police department.

item.title: More 3D Touch Experiments: Drawing a Buffer
item.description: Drawing a buffered area on a web map using 3D Touch APIs in JavaScript.

item.title: Tracking Mary Lee
item.description: A quick map showing the track of the great white shark Mary Lee.
